alert.note: Alert for Washington (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 19 at 1:53PM MDT until August 19 at 4:45PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: The National Weather Service in Salt Lake City has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Southeastern Washington County in southwestern Utah... * Until 445 PM MDT. * At 153 PM MDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area, with anywhere from a half inch to an inch having already fallen in the Short Creek headwaters vicinity. Additionally, more storms are moving into the area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Hildale. This includes the following streams and drainages... Short Creek, Second Creek and South Creek. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
